altTitles.ja: -ボルト- Two Blue Vortex

description.en:
With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

(Source: MangaPlus)

---

**Links:**
- [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)
description.es:
La memoria colectiva de la gente ha cambiado, y ahora la Villa de la Hoja va detrás de la vida de Boruto. Pese a las adversidades, alguien ha estado esperando junto a Sasuke después de abandonar la Villa.

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.fr: Les « souvenirs » des gens ont changé et désormais, la vie de Boruto est menacée au village caché de Konoha. La situation est telle que Boruto quitte le village avec Sasuke sans savoir ce qui les attend…
description.id:
Sesuatu telah mengubah "memori" para warga. Boruto yang kini menjadi buron melarikan diri dari Konoha bersama Sasuke. Di tengah konflik itu, yang telah menanti keduanya adalah...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.th:
"ความทรงจำ" ของผู้คนเปลี่ยนไป ทำให้โบรุโตะต้องตกอยู่ในฐานะที่โดนหมู่บ้านโคโนะฮะงาคุเระหมายชีวิต ท่ามกลางเคราะห์ร้ายที่ประสบ สิ่งที่รอคอยโบรุโตะซึ่งหนีออกจากหมู่บ้านไปพร้อมๆ กับซาสึเกะก็คือ...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.vi:
Với ký ức của mọi người đã bị thay đổi, Boruto thấy mình đang bị chính ngôi làng của mình săn đuổi. Sau khi trốn thoát cùng Sasuke, tương lai nào đang chờ đợi Boruto...? 
Đây là phần 2 của Boruto
description.pt-br: As "memórias" das pessoas foram alteradas e Boruto está numa posição onde a Vila Oculta da Folha quer tomar a sua vida. Durante essa adversidade, o que Boruto aguardava quando deixou a vila com o Sasuke era...

altTitles.ja: 水姫先輩の恋占い

description.en:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title.en: Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon - Moon Phase

altTitles.ja: 月姫 -A piece of blue glass moon- ムーンフェイズ

description.en: An anthology featuring characters from Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon.

title.en: Ore ni Trauma wo Ataeta Joshi-tachi ga Chirachira Mitekuru kedo, Zannen desu ga Teokure desu

altTitles.ja: 俺にトラウマを与えた女子達がチラチラ見てくるけど、残念ですが手遅れです

altTitles.en: The Girls Who Traumatized Me Keeps Glancing at Me, but Alas, It’s Too Late

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas que me traumaron me están mirando, pero desafortunadamente es demasiado tarde.

description.en: Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. His sister hates him. His mother neglected him. Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?!
description.ja: 九重雪兎は昔から女運が悪い。両想いだと思っていた幼馴染にはフラれ、姉には嫌われ、母親には疎まれ――度重なるトラウマの果てに感情がぶっ壊れてしまう。そんな雪兎が高校に入学したら、彼にトラウマを与えてきた女子達がやたらと彼のことを気にかけてきて……!?　手遅れから始まる勘違い思春期ラブコメ、開幕！
description.es-la:
Yukito Kokonoe siempre ha tenido mala suerte. Es odiado por su madre, su hermana, y su amiga de la infancia, pensaba que tenían sentimientos mutuos, pero ella se siente frustrada antes de la confesión, e incluso hace travesuras durante sus heridas, y sus emociones se rompen después de repetidos traumas con muchas mujeres.

Sin embargo, cuando ingresó a la escuela preparatoria, ¿¡Las chicas que lo traumatizaron comenzaron a preocuparse por él ...!?
Esta es una comedia romántica de un adolescente incomprendido que comienza demasiado tarde.

altTitles.ja: こっくりマジョ裁判

description.en: Gamer girls were transported to a mysterious location and have to play games. Maybe if they win they will be able to leave..?

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

title.ja: Tenkousaki no Seiso Karen na Bishoujo ga, Mukashi Danshi to Omotte Issho ni Asonda Osananajimi datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転校先の清楚可憐な美少女が、昔男子と思って一緒に遊んだ幼馴染だった件

altTitles.en: The Neat and Beautiful Girl at My New School is My Childhood Friend Who I Used to Play With Thinking She Was a Boy
Tenkosaki: The Neat and Pretty Girl at My New School Is a Childhood Friend of Mine Who I Thought Was a Boy
A Neat and Pretty Girl at the Transfer Destination Was a Childhood Friend Who Used to Think That She Was a Boy and Played With Her.

altTitles.zh-hk: 我在轉校後遇到的清純可愛美少女，是我曾認為是男孩子並一塊玩耍過的青梅竹馬

altTitles.ru: Аккуратная и красивая девушка в моей новой школе - моя подруга детства, с которой я играл,думая, что она мальчик.

altTitles.es: Una chica linda me miro en mi nueva escuela, pero resulto ser mi amiga de la infancia que solía pensar que era un chico

description.en:
I met my childhood friend again, and she had become a beautiful and innocent girl.

"It's been a while, Hayato."
"Haruki, is it?"

In the past, I used to play in the mud with my childhood friend in the countryside, and when I saw him again, there was no trace of the bratty young man I thought he was back then. Only in front of Hayato, she threw away the coat she was wearing and reacted in the same crass way she did back then. The distance between you and me has not changed.
description.es: Cuando fui transferido a otra escuela una chica linda me miro, pero resulto ser mi amigo de la infancia que solía pensar que era un chico Volví a encontrar a mi amiga de la infancia y se había convertido en una chica hermosa e inocente. "Ha pasado un tiempo, Hayato." Haruki, ¿es verdad? En el pasado, solía jugar en el barro con mi amigo de la infancia en el campo, y cuando lo volví a ver, no había rastro del joven malcriado que pensé que era en ese entonces. Solo frente a Hayato, la veo detrás de la fachada que llevaba y reaccionó de la misma manera grosera que lo hizo en ese entonces. La distancia entre tú y yo no ha cambiado.
description.ja: 7年前、一番仲良しの男友達と、ずっと友達でいると約束した。高校生になって再会した親友は……まさかの学校一の清楚可憐な美少女!? なのに俺の前でだけ昔のノリだなんて……最高の「友達」ラブコメ！最高の「男友達」だったはずの美少女との、ピュアラブコメ、コミカライズでも開幕！
description.pt-br:
Reencontrei minha amiga de infância e ela se tornou uma garota linda e inocente.

"Já faz um tempo, Hayato."
"Haruki, não é?"

No passado, eu costumava brincar na lama com meu amigo de infância no campo e, quando o vi novamente, não havia nenhum vestígio do jovem malcriado que eu pensava que ele era naquela época. Só que na frente de Hayato ela jogou fora o casaco que vestia e reagiu da mesma forma grosseira de naquela época. A distância entre você e eu não mudou.

A popular webnovel fofa agora está em formato mangá!

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.ja: まよマヨ!

description.en: A story with the same setting as Mayo Chiki! however the main character is now a high school girl named Hinata Mayoi who suffers from gynophobia. While using the girl's washroom she accidentally discovers that the popular and handsome butler Subaru Konoe is in fact a girl. Now that she knows about Subaru's secret, she must work together with Subaru and her sadistic mistress, Kanade Suzutsuki, to protect Subaru’s secret from being discovered.

altTitles.ja: ちゃんと吸えない吸血鬼ちゃん

description.en: The overwhelming preciousness that captivates all those whose blood she sucks!
description.ja:
クラスメイトの石川月菜は吸血鬼。クールでミステリアスな彼女はクラスの人気者！だけど、実は血を吸うのがメッチャ下手！？

クラスのモブ的存在・大鳥くんはひょんなことからそんな吸血鬼ちゃんの練習相手になることに…！
description.pt-br: A preciosidade esmagadora que cativa todos aqueles cujo sangue ela suga! Um novo tipo de comédia de mimos e alimentação!

altTitles.ja: WORST外伝 ドクロ

description.en: A story about how a pre-6th Gen Head Kawachi Tesshou first encounters and then joins the Front of Armament, and also meets characters like Murata Shougo.

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

altTitles.ja: 魔法のつかいかた

description.en: I'm a sorcerer's apprentice. The sorcerer, Sentarou-san, kidnapped me from my mother and asked me to live with him. But Sentarou-san has probably killed someone before... Sakae Kusama's first full-length series, depicting the cool and gentle days of a useless adult and a lonely child, opens!

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.ja: 現実主義勇者の王国再建記

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki

altTitles.en: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom
A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

altTitles.fr: Comment un Héro réaliste reconstruit un Royaume

altTitles.vi: Công Cuộc Tái Thiết Vương Quốc Của Anh Hùng Chủ Nghĩa Hiện Thực

description.en:
"O, Hero!"

With that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure - did not begin. 

After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! 

In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! 

What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?
description.fr: « Bonjour, Héros ». Après une convocation tout à fait banale dans un autre monde, Kazuya Souma se retrouve à l'aube d'une aventure épique–ou peux être pas. Après avoir présenté un plan pour renforcer économiquement et militairement le pays qui l'avait invoqué, le roi décide subitement de céder son trône à notre héros pour le meilleur et le pire, sans même demander l'avis de Kazuya. Et par-dessus tout, Kazuya se retrouva ainsi fiancé avec la propre fille de l'ancien roi. Afin d’obtenir un pays stable, il fera appel à tous les talents, les sages et les génies pour qu’ils soient à ses côtés. Cinq personnes se réunirent autour de Souma nouvellement couronné pour l’assister. Quels sont ces nombreux talents et les capacités qu’ils possèdent …!? Quelle sera la voie qu’il décidera d’emprunter pour ainsi révolutionner entièrement ce monde fantastique.
description.ja:
異世界に突如として勇者召喚された相馬一也。だが、彼の“勇者”としての冒険は――始まらなかった。国王から国家の抱える危機と課題を聞き出した彼は、持ち前の現代の知識を活かし富国強兵策を提案。すると……「召喚されし勇者ソーマ・カズヤに王位を譲る！」なんと、あろうことか国王より譲位されてしまう。さらに王女をソーマの婚約者にすると発表され――!?

若き国王ソーマと腹心の仲間とが共に国家の再興を目指す異世界本格内政ファンタジー開幕！

title.en: Ore no vaccine dake ga zonbi-ka shita sekai o sukueru

altTitles.ja: 俺のワクチンだけがゾンビ化した世界を救える

altTitles.en: Only My Vaccine Can Save the World From Zombie Apocalypse

description.en: Oikawa Yuu, who has been shut up in his house, is certain to die as a virgin at the age of 21. This is because the whole world has become a place filled with zombies... One day, a survivor visits Yuu's house. The woman, who calls herself Sunny, injects Yuu with a vaccine that may save the world from the zombies... but as a result, Yuu gains the ability to turn zombies back into humans by having sex...?
description.ja: 自宅にひきこもる及川優は22歳にして童貞で死ぬことが確定してしまった。なぜなら、世界中がゾンビで溢れる世界になってしまったから……。そんな優の自宅に一人の生存者が訪れる。サニーと名乗るその女性は、ゾンビ化した世界を救う可能性をもつワクチンを優に打ち込む……が、それによって優はセックスすることでゾンビを人間に戻す能力を手に入れて――？

title.en: A Woman Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect

altTitles.ja: 京都弁なのに正直すぎる女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyoto-ben na no ni Shoujiki Sugiru Onna

altTitles.vi: Cô gái ấy quá trung thực mặc cho giọng thổ ngữ Kyoto của mình

altTitles.en: A Girl Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect

altTitles.es-la: Una chica demasiado honesta a pesar de su dialecto de Kyoto

altTitles.fr: Trop honnête pour quelqu’un qui parle Kyoto !

altTitles.ja: カワセミさんの釣りごはん

description.en: High school student, Kawasemi, who has transferred to the countryside, spends her days alone due to her shyness. One day, she is approached by her classmate Misago, a so-called 'countryside Yankee', and was taken to the mountains. Kawasemi was afraid of what she would do, but then Misago starts fishing!?
description.ja: 田舎に転校してきた女子高生・カワセミは、人見知りのせいで一人ぼっちの日々を過ごしていた。そんなある日、田舎ヤンキー（？）のクラスメイト・ミサゴに声をかけられたと思うや否や、山奥へと連れていかれてしまう。何をされるか怖がるカワセミだが、ミサゴが始めたのは釣りで――。

altTitles.ja: パンプキンナイト

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。

The first volume features different stories about the original cast's training sessions and special techniques. It fills in gaps that were never explained before and offers a new point of view about some in-game scenes.  
  
The second volume recreates the world seen in the videogame "Inazuma Eleven Strikers" for Wii, from the point of view of Inazuma Japan. It features many characters from every season and situations only seen in said game.

description.en:
Q: Describe your feelings upon discovering your trusted dad isn’t just an extra.
A: W-what the heck... Give me back my ‘Random Imperial Citizen #1’ life...

Living in a world of constant war—365 days of chaos—a simple, extra's existence was a blessing.
At least, that's what I thought.

In a small village, I enjoyed a humble life with my loving, ordinary father, James Brown, 27, the epitome of an unremarkable single dad.

Or so I believed.

“Ladies and gentlemen, presenting my father! The quintessential symbol of extras everywhere! Brown hair, brown eyes, plain and simple!”
“...”
“This man screams ‘background character,’ living a quiet life chopping wood in a mountain village with his adorable daughter. Right? ...RIGHT?”

The knight commander merely stared at me in silence.

And then, the unthinkable happened.

Behind me, my father’s worn staff began to glow with a strange, blue aura.

“...Dad?”

Before I could process what was happening, his unassuming brown hair and eyes shifted. Slowly but surely, they transformed into...

Shimmering silver locks and piercing blue eyes—practically shouting “I’m the protagonist!”

“WHAT?!”

My simple, extra life shattered into a million pieces as my dad—no, this mysterious powerhouse—gripped his weapon and snarled:
“Give me back my daughter, you bastard.”

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)

description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

description.en:
Beryl Gardinant, a self-proclaimed "humble old man," is a sword instructor at his dojo in a rural, backwater village. In his younger years, he dreamed of glory as a master swordsman, but those days are long behind him. 

Out of the blue, he receives a visit from a famous former pupil who brings him world-shattering news - he’s been appointed as a special instructor for the knights of the Liberion Order! With his life now turned upside down, Beryl travels to the capital and reunites with some of his former students: elite knights, an ace wizard, and even an adventurer who’s attained the highest guild rank possible. 

But why do they all want his tutelage?! As far as he’s concerned, they clearly don’t need him anymore. 

Can Beryl live up to his new position? And will he ever get a moment’s peace away from his adoring students?!

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)

description.en:
My name is Asagi Kamiyashiro. My last memories of my old life were a night like every other at my part-time job up until an unnamed assailant mercilessly stabbed me. As I was fading into an empty void losing my consciousness, I had an explosive realization of how much I regretted in this life. I never honestly used my degree, I never had a girlfriend, and I lived a pretty quiet life. Day in and day out I worked like I was on clockwork. As the thought of regrets filled my mind, I told myself, if I was reincarnated I would make use of that life to its fullest. That's when a disembodied voice spoke.  
 
_"The desire to be reincarnated confirmed. Granting Unique Skillset: Jack of All Trades, Master of None"_ 
 
At first, I considered those words to be insulting… But now… Not so much… My story begins in the middle of a foggy grass hill.

---
**Note:** The chapter *numbering* in the Volumes are one ahead of the Magazine/Digital due to treating the split 2.1 & 2.2 as separate chapters (2 & 3)
description.id: Aku, Asagi Kamiyashiro, diserang oleh perampok saat bekerja paruh waktu. Ketika aku bangun, saya dipindahkan ke dunia lain yang dihuni oleh monster. Aku tidak pernah berpikir saya akan diserang oleh goblin dalam hidupku! Aku berhasil mencapai kota dan memeriksa statusku di Guild Petualang, hanya untuk menemukan bahwa kecepatanku tinggi. Selanjutnya, nama dari skill yang kumiliki adalah "Jack of all trades, master of none"...?
description.ja:
**小説家になろう発!!　異世界最速!? 神速と万能スキルを持つ異世界転移者のファンタジー、開幕!!**

**「異世界に来た僕は器用貧乏で素早さ頼りな旅をする｣
異世界転移した転移者の素早さ極振りの楽勝ライフが漫画に！**
 
 
アルバイト中に強盗に襲われた僕、上代朝霧。次に目を覚ましたのは、異世界だった。空腹に耐えられず、ひとまず向かった森でゴブリンに遭遇。しかし、なぜだか上手く武器を使え、撃退に成功する!!

　その後も狼に追われたりしつつも、何とか町へと到着。そこでギルドに加入し、依頼をこなしていたら、素早さの数値が異常に上昇していることが発覚!!だから、僕はこの素早さと器用(貧乏)さを武器に、この世界で生きることを決めるのだが――

　異世界最速の転生者が駆け抜けるファンタジーライフ、開幕!!
description.pt-br: Tarde da noite, no meio do meu trabalho de meio período em uma loja de conveniência, tive um encontro com um ladrão e fui impiedosamente morto a facadas. Quando estava prestes a perder minha consciência, pensei o quanto eu queria fazer isso e aquilo quando ouvi uma voz... 'O desejo de ser convocado foi confirmado. Concedendo habilidade única. 'Valete para toda obra, Mestre de ninguém.'' Palavras rudes como essas foram ditas.  Jack de todos os comércios, mestre de ninguém? Não mexa comigo! Esses pensamentos e desejos foram em vão quando minha consciência se desvaneceu, quando eu acordei estava em uma colina verde e nevoenta.

description.en: Sayeon Lee despises Aberrants. They wreak havoc on society with their strange, unthinkable powers. It's just too bad she happens to be an Aberrant herself! Forced to fend for her life in the deadly Aberrant Corps, she's determined to make it to the top, and her unusual ability should help her -- if she can figure out how to use it in time.

altTitles.en: Assistant Who is Immune to Love Potion
An Assistant Immune to Love Potions

altTitles.ja: 罪と罰のスピカ

altTitles.vi: Spica - Tội Ác và Hình Phạt

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。
description.vi:
Câu chuyện xoay quanh Hatori, một giáo viên tại trường cấp 3 và là người có cuộc sống rất đỗi bình thường. Một ngày nọ, anh nhận ra rằng học sinh mà mình chủ nhiệm, Tsumugi Spica đang bị bạn cùng lớp bắt nạt.
Những tưởng đây chỉ là một cô bé nhút nhát, nhưng...

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.zh-ro: Tā De Shān, Tā De Hǎi

description.en:
[Gentle, tenacious honor student X cold domineering girl] 

Chi Tang and Youyu are both weirdos in Year 1 Class 2 of high school. They become desk mates, roommates, each other's salvation, protecting the other's warmth. The relationship between the two went from ignorance to understanding. A poem of youth composed.
description.zh: （温柔坚韧学霸&骄横高冷少女）池唐和游余都是高一二班被敬而远之的异类，她们成为同桌和室友，也成为救赎、保护彼此的温暖。两人的感情从懵懂到刻骨，谱写一首青春的诗歌。

description.fr:
Seoljin est un vrai loser à l'école : il est méprisé par tous, même par ceux qu'il croyait être ses amis. La seule chose qu'il puisse faire pour échapper à cette dure réalité, c'est de lire des webtoons d'action, de s'imaginer à la place des héros qui se battent courageusement contre leurs adversaires, sans la moindre hésitation. Mais la vie de Seoljin va prendre un tout autre tournant lorsqu'il laissera un petit commentaire sur le webtoon "Player" : un commentaire qui, bientôt, le conduira dans l'univers-même de ce webtoon !

description.zh:
弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

description.pt-br: Depois de postar um “Melhor Comentário”, de alguma forma eu me tornei o personagem principal de uma webtoon!

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she's a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it's not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie...?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

地味なJKが美少女に○○される話

description.en: Just your plain average high school girl, getting involved in yuri shenanigans.

altTitles.ja: ５時間目のブラックージャック

description.en:
A short Matsumoto Taiyou story about a kid pretending to be a certain doctor.
Produced in cooperation with Tezuka Productions (IP holders for Black Jack). First appeared in "The DNA of Manga", a sort of tribute book to Tezuka Osamu.

Do you ever wonder what the most popular boy at school is really like? As it turns out, he might be just as awkward and shy as any of us. That’s what wallflower Jayu Nam begins to discover after a chance encounter with Jahyeok Yeo, a boy in her class who seems to excel at everything in life. Well, almost. Underneath Jahyeok’s persona is a secret super-introvert who would rather just stay home, except his charming good looks keep forcing him into social situations. Together, Jayu and Jahyeok begin to learn a little something about friendship and maybe more…
description.pt-br: Você já se perguntou como é, de verdade, o garoto mais popular da escola? Acontece que ele pode ser tão desajeitado e tímido quanto qualquer um de nós. É o que Jayu Nam, uma garota discreta e reservada, começa a perceber depois de um encontro inesperado com Jahyeok Yeo, um colega de classe que parece ser bom em tudo na vida. Bem, quase tudo. Por trás do carisma de Jahyeok, esconde-se um super-introvertido que preferiria ficar em casa, mas sua aparência cativante sempre o empurra para situações sociais. Juntos, Jayu e Jahyeok começam a aprender um pouco sobre amizade e, quem sabe, algo mais…

altTitles.ja: 全く威厳が保てない狼ちゃん

description.en: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.

altTitles.ja: ブトゥーム

description.en:
Sakamoto Ryouta is an unemployed 22-year-old who lives with his mother. In the real world, there may be nothing really special about him, but online, he's one of the world's top players of the combat game "BTOOOM"!  
  
One day, he awakes in what appears to be a tropical island, though he has no memory of how or why he has come to be there. While wandering around, Ryouta sees someone and calls out for help. The stranger responds by throwing a bomb at him! Now Ryouta realizes both that his life is in danger, and that he has somehow been trapped in a real-life version of his favorite game! Will Ryouta be able to survive long enough to figure out how and why he ended up here?  
  


---
description.ru:
Сакамото Рёта — 22-летний безработный, игрок мирового уровня в популярную командную боевку «Btooom!». То, что он при этом сидит на шее у матери, парня не волнует, мыслями он всецело в виртуальном мире, где крут, беспощаден и неотразим. Только в наше время до виртуальной реальности далеко — в этом Рёта убедился на своей шкуре, очнувшись в джунглях, крепко избитый, с чужой сумкой и полным сумбуром в голове. В общем, вышло так, что чья-то злая воля закинула на необитаемый остров несколько десятков игроков и предложила им сразиться в «Btooom!» вживую и по-крупному. Без оружия, без доспехов — только ручные бомбы, собственные тела и гражданская одежда. Как говорится — естественный отбор!  
  
Но истинного игрока королевской битвой смутить сложно, особенно когда на кону собственная жизнь. Так что вскоре Рёта отбросил интеллигентские сопли и приготовился, как не столь далекие предки, жить по принципу «или ты, или тебя». Главное — выжить, а там уже можно пофилософствовать о смысле бытия и вдоволь поспорить с сердечной подругой Химико — за что им досталась такая участь? Как говорят: не согрешишь — не покаешься, не покаешься — не спасешься. А еще на острове можно повидать новые места, насладиться прекрасной природой, встретить много интересных людей… и убить их!  
  


---
